attributes.action: Should legalise cannabis it has never killed no one and helps people with issues
attributes.additional_details: Evidence is that cannabis oil helps people with several illnesses if the government have a problem because they don't make text then they should legalise and tax it but making it illegal it's getting people putti prison who needed it for nt criminal offence issues but health issues  also people who sell do it because they aint got a job and they have a family to feed and can't a job because you would rather give it to polish or Romanian for low wages we need to be an economy working together cannabis helps people in all ways from pain to depression to relaxing to making money to support family's sounds silly but so true
attributes.background: We all no that cannabis helps certain people wit certain things it helps my mum who has cancer get to sleep at night and not feel no pain in her belly which no tablets can help her with what the doctors give her which actuelly make her worse
